source-layers.sql: SELECT the_geom_webmercator, ST_Area(the_geom) as area, cartodb_id as id, altmappdf, extract(epoch from effective) as effective, status FROM citymap_amendments WHERE effective IS NOT NULL OR status = '13' ORDER BY area DESC
SELECT the_geom_webmercator, official_s AS streetname, COALESCE('   (' || streetwidt || ' ft)') AS streetwidth, roadway_ty, feature_st FROM citymap_streetcenterlines
SELECT the_geom_webmercator, type, boro_nm FROM citymap_citymap
SELECT the_geom_webmercator, intronumbe, intro_year, ll_effecti, CASE WHEN honoraryna = 'none' THEN officialna ELSE honoraryna END FROM citymap_streetnamechanges_points
SELECT the_geom_webmercator, intronumbe, intro_year, ll_effecti, CASE WHEN honoraryna = 'none' THEN officialna ELSE honoraryna END FROM citymap_streetnamechanges_streets
SELECT the_geom_webmercator, intronumbe, intro_year, ll_effecti, CASE WHEN honoraryna = 'none' THEN officialna ELSE honoraryna END FROM citymap_streetnamechanges_areas
